system_messages.error_title: An error has occurred, please try again later
system_messages.error_desc: If this error persists, please contact @v3xi

settings_main_menu.title: Server Settings
settings_main_menu.description:
-
Please select the settings you would like to edit

channel: Select the channels for channel specific messages
commands: Modify usage settings for Add/Edit/Delete commands
detection: Modify the filter settings for quotes added to QuoteBot
automod: Modify the AutoMod actions for QuoteBot

language_settings.title: Language Settings
language_settings.description:
-
Please select the language for QuoteBot messages
language_change_success: QuoteBot's language has been sucessfully changed to English
